text: Blaž Kramer (born 1 June 1996) is a Slovenian football player who plays as forward for Swiss Super League club FC Zürich. ==Professional career== After a successful spell with VfL Wolfsburg II, Kramer joined FC Zürich on a 3 year contract on 19 June 2019. Kramer made his professional debut with Zürich in a 4-0 Swiss Super League loss to FC Lugano on 21 July 2019. ==International career== He made his Slovenia national football team debut on 6 September 2020 in a Nations League game against Moldova, he substituted Andraž Šporar in the 85th minute of the 1–0 home victory. ==References== ==External Links== * * FCZ Profile * NZS National Profile * NZS Club Profile Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Celje Category:Slovenian footballers Category:Slovenia youth international footballers Category:Slovenia under-21 international footballers Category:Slovenia international footballers Category:FC Zürich players Category:VfL Wolfsburg II players Category:Swiss Super League players Category:Regionalliga players Category:Slovenian PrvaLiga players Category:Slovenian Second League players Category:Association football forwards Category:Slovenian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany Category:Expatriate footballers in Switzerland
title: Blaž Kramer
